content:
EXISTING STRUCTURES
────────────────────────────
### Central Production Hub at position(0.5, 0.5)
Consists of:
- Wooden chest at position(0.5, 0.5) serving as the central resource storage.
- Stone furnace at position(1.0, -1.0) that smelts iron ore into iron plates.
- Stone furnace at position(3.0, 1.0) that smelts copper ore into copper plates.

### Research Lab at position(6.5, 6.5)
Consists of:
- Lab at position(6.5, 6.5) performing automation research (input: {automation-science-pack: 10}).
- ElectricityGroup connecting small electric poles at positions (8.5, 6.5), (9.5, 6.5), and (10.5, 7.5).

### Steam-Powered Electricity Generator at position(-10.5, 18.5)
Consists of:
- Steam Engine at position(-10.5, 18.5) with connection points at (-10.5, 16.0) and (-10.5, 21.0); warnings include [not connected to power network, no input liquid, no fluid present in connections].
- Boiler at position(-6.0, 24.5) that is out of fuel and holds approximately 190 units of water (~15°); connection points at (-5.5, 22.5) and (-5.5, 26.5); now associated with fluid_system [79958] and featuring a steam output at (-7.5, 24.5).
- Offshore Pump at position(-9.5, 24.5) delivering water; now associated with fluid_system [79958] with connection point at (-9.5, 23.5).
- Manual Fuel Feeding System represented by a wooden chest at position(-4.5, 25.5).
- Pipeline Network comprising:
  • PipeGroup at position(-5.5, 19.5) with fluid_system = 79958 (status: WORKING).
  • PipeGroup at position(-2.5, 19.5) with fluid_system = 79957 (status: EMPTY).
  • PipeGroup at position(5.5, 21.5) with fluid_system = 79970 (status: EMPTY).
  • PipeGroup at position(1.5, 23.5) with fluid_system = 79969 (status: EMPTY).
  • PipeGroup at position(-7.5, 25.5) with fluid_system = 79965 (status: EMPTY).
  • PipeGroup at position(0.5, 24.5) with fluid_system = 79974 (status: EMPTY).
  • PipeGroup at position(1.5, 25.5) with fluid_system = 79973 (status: EMPTY).
  • PipeGroup at position(1.5, 27.5) with fluid_system = 79976 (status: EMPTY).
  • PipeGroup at position(4.5, 27.5) with fluid_system = 79977 (status: EMPTY).
  • PipeGroup at position(-0.5, 28.5) with fluid_system = 79978 (status: EMPTY).

ERROR TIPS
────────────────────────────
• Inventory Attribute Validation:
  - Use only supported inventory attributes when accessing inventory items.

• Pipeline Connection Candidate Mismatch and Fluid System Inconsistency:
  - Repeated attempts to connect the steam engine employed fluid_system identifiers [79294, 79378, 79460, 79544, 79626, 79710, 79792, 79876] which did not match any nearby pipe groups.
  - Verify that the fluid_system value used in connection attempts corresponds with the actual pipe group present (for example, the pipe group at position (-5.5, 19.5) is now associated with fluid_system 79958).
  - Ensure synchronization between pipeline network configurations and connection attempts to avoid repeated failures.
